ascii.name: Attachment Marker
ascii.tooltip: the marker name that the glow should be attached to

int16.name: Number Of Particles
int16.tooltip: the number of particles that comprise the glow system

enum16.name: Boundary Effect
enum16.tooltip: particles behavior on reaching the end of an object

enum16.name: Normal Particle Distribution
enum16.tooltip: distribution of the normal particles about the object

enum16.name: Trailing Particle Distribution
enum16.tooltip: distribution of the trailing particles about the object

float32.name: Particle Rotational Velocity Multiplier Low
float32.tooltip: multiplied by overall velocity; only used if controlled by attachment

float32.name: Particle Rotational Velocity Multiplier High
float32.tooltip: multiplied by overall velocity; only used if controlled by attachment

float32.name: Effect Rotational Velocity Multiplier Low
float32.tooltip: multiplied by overall velocity; only used if controlled by attachment

float32.name: Effect Rotational Velocity Multiplier High
float32.tooltip: multiplied by overall velocity; only used if controlled by attachment

float32.name: Effect Translational Velocity Multiplier Low
float32.tooltip: multiplied by overall velocity; only used if controlled by attachment

float32.name: Effect Translational Velocity Multiplier High
float32.tooltip: multiplied by overall velocity; only used if controlled by attachment

float32.name: Distance To Object Multiplier Low
float32.tooltip: multiplied by particle distance; only used if controlled by attachment

float32.name: Distance To Object Multiplier High
float32.tooltip: multiplied by particle distance; only used if controlled by attachment

rangef.name: Size Attachment Multiplier
rangef.tooltip: multiplied by particle size; only used if controlled by attachment

colorf.name: Color Bound 0
colorf.tooltip: the color of all particles will vary between color bound 0 and color bound 1

colorf.name: Color Bound 1
colorf.tooltip: the color of all particles will vary between color bound 0 and color bound 1

colorf.name: Scale Color 0
colorf.tooltip: used to scale the particle color; only used if controlled by attachment

colorf.name: Scale Color 1
colorf.tooltip: used to scale the particle color; only used if controlled by attachment

float32.name: Color Rate Of Change
float32.tooltip: for glow effects that dynamically control particle color; sets rate of change

float32.name: Fading Percentage Of Glow
float32.tooltip: percentage of the glow that is fading at any given time

float32.name: Particle Generation Freq
float32.tooltip: frequency in Hz that trailing particles are generated

float32.name: Lifetime Of Trailing Particles
float32.tooltip: seconds that a trailing particle remains in existence
